column1: # Consolidated Banking Risk Management Dataset - Synthetic Data Generated by AI for Demonstration Purposes
# This dataset combines loan portfolio data

column3: and capital planning demonstrations. All data is artificial and AI-generated.

column1: # Risk Framework: Basel III/IV compliance metrics included
# maturity_date: Final maturity date of loan
# collateral_type: Type of collateral securing loan
# days_past_due: Number of days payment is past due
# charge_off_flag: Binary flag for charge-offs (1=charged off)
# exposure_at_default: Exposure amount at time of default ($)
# provision_credit_losses: Quarterly provision for credit losses ($)
# gdp_growth_rate: Economic scenario GDP growth rate (%)
# home_price_index: Economic scenario home price index (base=1.0)
